Package ch.ethz.inf.vs.appserver

Class Summary
AppManager The AppManager is the connection between all resources that deal with apps and their instances.
AppResource AppResource is the root of all resources around instances of apps.
AppServer An app server creates a structure of CoAP resources to run arbitrary JavaScript apps on it.
Main Calls the main Method of the AppServer.
RunningResource The RunningResource contains all running apps.
SimpleAppServer A console based application that simulates an app server and runs a JavaScriptApp specified in the arguments given in the main method.
StatsResource Statsresource holds the stats of all app instances and their subresources.
